title: T206 Sovereign & Polar Bear - Selling Individually
author: Jaybird

posts.post_title: T206 Sovereign & Polar Bear - Selling Individually
posts.post_content:
Here is a lot of 10 Sovereign and Polar Bear T206.  $47 each delivered.  Some have surface wrinkle.  Look closely at the scans and you can see them.  Any specific questions, ask away.  I would think all would grade out in the solid 3-4 range. 

Arndt - SOLD
Butler - SOLD
Camnitz
Fiene
Flanagan
Malarkey - SOLD
Moran
Rhoades
Thielman
Wiltse

[IMG]http://i1023.photobucket.com/albums/af353/jasonleemiller/SOLDSovereign.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://i1023.photobucket.com/albums/af353/jasonleemiller/IMG_0001-4.jpg[/IMG]

I'll take the Arndt if you break the lot.

Peter

I will break the lot tomorrow morning if no offers come in tonight.  There is a surface wrinkle on the Arndt upper left hand corner that you can see in the scan.  Just making sure you know what you are getting.  

paypal is [url]jasonleemiller@ca.rr.com[/url].  I'll let you know in the morning and if you still want it you can paypal "payment owed" to me.

Thanks,

Jason
